function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced degree of openness in the office workplace","Impact":"Negatively impacting inter-personal relationships","Mitigation":"Implementation of virtual interaction spaces and collaboration tools","Technologies":"Virtual meeting platforms, collaborative software","People":"Employees, team members","Owner":"HR department, management team"},{"Description":"Work from home becoming the norm","Impact":"Reduced social interactions and collaboration in the physical office space","Mitigation":"Promoting hybrid work models and flexible workspace solutions","Technologies":"Remote work technology, flexible workspace management tools","People":"Employers, employees","Owner":"Facilities management, HR department"}]}
